alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:46PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Coconino County north of Fraziers Well through 115 PM MST... At 1244 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Laguna Lake, or 60 miles west of Desert View at Grand Canyon, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hualapai Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
